title: Shroud of Turin News - November 2015
post: Anonymous>Retirement- Hi Stephen, I appreciate the fact that you share some parts of your private life with your readers.Thanks, but I only shared that I had retired to let my readers know that I now hope to blog more often about the Shroud.Stephen E. Jones----------------------------------MY POLICIES Comments are moderated. Those I consider off-topic, offensive or sub-standard will not appear. Except that comments under my latest post can be on any Shroud-related topic without being off-topic. I normally allow only one comment per individual under each one of my posts.
author: Stephen E. Jones
